thread.title: Nando's has made changes to its menu
thread.title_full: Nando's has made changes to its menu

author: Bath Chronicle
title: Nando's has made changes to its menu
text:
Nando's has made changes to its menu By Bath Chronicle | Posted: October 22, 2015 Nando's has made changes to its menu Nando's has made changes to its menu X 
Copy link to paste in your message / Comments (4) 
Fans of Nando's will be able to enjoy something more than chicken the next time they visit their nearest restaurant. 
The chain is well-known for its chicken dishes but now it has added a few new items to its menu. 
Customers can now choose from a fillet steak and chargrilled vegetables, which is beef steak marinated in PERi-PERi and flame-grilled, with juicy Chargrilled Veg and wild garlic aioli mayonnaise, or a fillet steak Prego Roll, also marinated in PERi-PERi and flame-grilled, served with wild garlic aioli mayonnaise in a Portuguese Roll. 
The Nando's menu now also includes chicken drumsticks and a new side dish of chargrilled vegetables. Related content
